higher_education.university: Superior School of Advanced Studies of Pisa

client_description.Summary Note:
Ferrari Fantini Malatesta and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Rome. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Ferrari Fantini Malatesta is a 31 year old Senior Associate from Italy.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
client_description.Family Background: Ferrari Fantini Malatesta is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background:
In 2013, Ferrari graduated from Liceo Musicale Ottorino Respighi Bologna with a secondary school diploma.
Ferrari earned his degree from University of Turin in 2016.
Additionally, he went on to study at Superior School of Advanced Studies of Pisa until 2021.
client_description.Occupation History:
Ferrari Fantini Malatesta is a 31 year old Senior Associate from Italy.
In 2017, Ferrari Fantini Malatesta started working as a Associate Attorney at Studio Legale Associato, marking the beginning of his successful career.
His subsequent role was as a Senior Associate at Gianni, Origoni, Grippo, Cappelli & Partners, where he continued to grow professionally from 2020 till now.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 40000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has condo located in Siena, worth 790000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 5850000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Venture Capitalist, in 2018.
client_description.Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
